ComicInfo.Title: Six
ComicInfo.Summary: By Francisco Solano Lopez, Ricardo Barreiro, and Pol. After the death of Lord Moore (suspected of Jessica and Agnes, who were many times mistreated by their sadistic father), Marion dies and Victoria is raised by her sisters, who initiate her into the cult of Ishtar. Diana, a witch descendant of the ancestral lineage of the Amazons, will lead the secret group of adorers of the ancient deity and gather the descendants of the ancient sisterhood. But Victoria doesnâ€™t share the misogyny of the group and flees after consummating with Sheldon (the father of Gurkoh), a mental deficient used by the cult to procreate.
